EncounterOmen.Title: Encounter Omen
Items: A roll of thunder booms across the land.
A black dog runs across the path.
A lone yellow flower is growing in the middle of the path.
A shadow drifts over the party.
A pool of blood is discovered.
The sun (or moon if at night) bursts through a small opening within a cloud, sending a radiant beam of light onto the party.
A beautiful white horse dashes past the party and disappears.
